summary: FAILURE OF INTAKE MANIFOLD AND GASKET ON MY AUTOMOBILE.  ALLOWED ENGINE COOLANT TO LEAK INTO THE CYLINDERS OF THE ENGINE.  CAR:  1996 PONTIAC BONNEVILLE WITH 3.8L V-6 ENGINE, USING THE DEX-COOL GM COOLANT.  REPAIRS REQUIRED A COMPLETE REPLACEMENT OF INTAKE MANIFOLD AND ALL ENGINE GASKETS.  REPAIRS COSTS EXCEED $1400.
